CustomField.formula: IF( sixsense__Buying_Stage__c = "Target", "Cold", IF(sixsense__Buying_Stage__c = "Awareness", "Warm", IF(sixsense__Buying_Stage__c = "Consideration", "Warm", IF(sixsense__Buying_Stage__c = "Decision", "Hot", IF(sixsense__Buying_Stage__c = "Purchase", "Hot", NULL)))))
CustomField.label: 6Sense Buying Stage
